radiographic_examinations.findings: Incomplete partition of the cochlea Type III on the right and a common cavity on the left. Middle and inner ear are clearly separated, increased sclerosis of the petrous bone in general.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: CT scans at the age of 4 months and 2 years showed a complex, cystic malformation of the inner ear and vestibular structures, without separation of inner and middle ear.

radiographic_examinations.findings: No structural changes of the pituitary or compromise by surrounding skeletal structures was detected.
